thread.title: Vernon Thompson

author: Vernon Thompson
title: Vernon Thompson
text:
To be honest I knew relatively nothing about coffee, except that I enjoyed a good espresso and my partner was keeping Starbucks shareholders in clover. I decided that in order to keep a roof over our heads, I would buy a good automatic espresso machine. After a lot of research I bought a Gaggia Accademia after reading that WLL.com use these in their own office. I have not been disappointed.
I received all my ancillary materials (cleaners, filters) and I also got all my Lavazza beans from the WLL website and they were delivered hassle-free.
Being a novice , the best help of all came from the instructional videos.
Well done WholeLatteLove
